# t1
+----+---------+
| id | pattern |
+----+---------+
|  1 | Divot   |
|  2 | Brick   |
|  3 | Grid    |

# t2

| id | pattern |
+----+---------+
| 1  | Divot   |
| A  | Brick   |
| B  | Grid    |
| C  | Diamond |
+----+---------+

ä¸€ä¸ª union ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

mysql> select * from t1 union select * from t2;
+----+---------+
| id | pattern |
+----+---------+
| 1  | Divot   |
| 2  | Brick   |
| 3  | Grid    |
| A  | Brick   |
| B  | Grid    |
| C  | Diamond |
+----+---------+
6 rows in set (0.00 sec)

é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ UNION ç»“æœä¸­å·²ç»å»é‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ— é¡»æŒ‡å®š DISTINCTã€‚å¦‚æœæƒ³ä¿ç•™æ‰€æœ‰ç»“æœå¯æŒ‡å®š ALLã€‚

mysql> SELECT * FROM t1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM t2;
+----+---------+
| id | pattern |
+----+---------+
| 1  | Divot   |
| 2  | Brick   |
| 3  | Grid    |
| 1  | Divot   |
| A  | Brick   |
| B  | Grid    |
| C  | Diamond |
+----+---------+
7 rows in set (0.00 sec)

æŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ä¸­å¯æ··åˆä½¿ç”¨ UNION ALL å’Œ UNION DISTINCTï¼Œå³è¾¹çš„ UNION DISTINCT æ›¿è¦†ç›–æ‰å·¦è¾¹ UNION ALLã€‚

ç»“åˆä½¿ç”¨ ORDER BY æˆ– LIMIT æ—¶ï¼Œåº”ä½¿ç”¨æ‹¬å·å°† SELECT è¯­å¥åŒ…è£¹ã€‚

(SELECT a FROM t1 WHERE a=10 AND B=1 ORDER BY a LIMIT 10)
UNION
(SELECT a FROM t2 WHERE a=11 AND B=2 ORDER BY a LIMIT 10);

å¯¹ UNION ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œæ•´ä½“æ’åºå’Œæ•°é‡é™åˆ¶ï¼š

(SELECT a FROM t1 WHERE a=10 AND B=1)
UNION
(SELECT a FROM t2 WHERE a=11 AND B=2)
ORDER BY a LIMIT 10;

SELECT ä¸­æŒ‡å®šäº†åˆ«åæ—¶ï¼ŒORDER BY åº”è¯¥ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥åˆ«åï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯çœŸå®çš„åˆ—åã€‚

(SELECT a AS b FROM t) UNION (SELECT ...) ORDER BY b;
-- ğŸš¨ Unknown column 'a' in 'order clause'
